text: Driopea cyrtomera is a species of beetle in the family Cerambycidae. It was described by Per Olof Christopher Aurivillius in 1922.Biolib.cz - Driopea. Retrieved on 8 September 2014. While larvae, these beetles usually drill into wood and can cause damage to trees or logged timber. ==References== Category:Driopea Category:Beetles described in 1922
title: Driopea cyrtomera
